# SHError.Code.invalidAudioFormat

**Case**

The error code to indicate an unsupported audio format.

## Declaration

```swift
case invalidAudioFormat
```

## Discussion

For the list of the supported audio formats, see [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHSignatureGenerator/append(_:at:)].

## Audio format errors

- **SHError.Code.audioDiscontinuity**: The error code to indicate the use of noncontiguous audio to request a match.
